title: Optimize cache eviction to O(log n)
description:
{
  "priority": 3,
  "type": "refactor",
  "context": "Replace O(n) linear scans in all 6 eviction strategies with heap-based structures. Current: iterates entire key set on every eviction. At 10k entries = 10k iterations.",
  "business_context": "100x performance improvement at scale. Critical for large cache sizes.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "LRU: Use OrderedDict.popitem(last=False) for O(1)",
    "LFU: Use heapq by access_count for O(log n)",
    "TTL: Use heapq by expiry for O(log n)",
    "FIFO: Use queue or timestamp index",
    "Update src/cache/eviction.py (lines 13-72)",
    "Add performance benchmarks"
  ],
  "success_criteria": [
    "All eviction strategies O(log n) or better",
    "Benchmark shows 50-100x improvement at 10k entries",
    "All cache tests pass",
    "Backward compatibility maintained"
  ]
}

parsed_description.context: Replace O(n) linear scans in all 6 eviction strategies with heap-based structures. Current: iterates entire key set on every eviction. At 10k entries = 10k iterations.
parsed_description.business_context: 100x performance improvement at scale. Critical for large cache sizes.
technical_requirements: LFU: Use heapq by access_count for O(log n)
TTL: Use heapq by expiry for O(log n)
FIFO: Use queue or timestamp index
